publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3102 Ross Finnie: Congratulations to East Renfrewshire for Being the Best-performing Local Authority for Exam Performance—That the Parliament congratulates East Renfrewshire on being the top-performing local authority in exam results, with 27% of its pupils passing five or more highers and 47% passing three or more; notes that St Ninian’s High School was the second-best performing state-funded school, with 37% of its pupils passing five highers or more, and further notes that a total of five schools from East Renfrewshire are included in the list of top-performing schools.
S3M-3102 Congratulations to East Renfrewshire for Being the Best-performing Local Authority for Exam Performance (lodged on 12 December 2008) Mike Pringle*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-3102 Congratulations to East Renfrewshire for Being the Best-performing Local Authority for Exam Performance (lodged on 12 December 2008) Ken Macintosh*

S3M-3102 Congratulations to East Renfrewshire for Being the Best-performing Local Authority for Exam Performance (lodged on 12 December 2008) Mike Pringle*, Bill Kidd*, Ken Macintosh*, Jack McConnell*
S3M-3102 Congratulations to East Renfrewshire for Being the Best-performing Local Authority for Exam Performance (lodged on 12 December 2008) Karen Gillon*
S3M-3102 Congratulations to East Renfrewshire for Being the Best-performing Local Authority for Exam Performance (lodged on 12 December 2008) Stuart McMillan*
